title: Bug 114905: Default value lost after modifying in list box of report parameter
description: Description: The default value set in a list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value is not set in the list box of the report parameter.
EB: The default value should be preserved after modifying it.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value, then click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify the default value from 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5. [Additional step(s) needed to complete SR].
